settings.product_conditions_title: I agree with terms and conditions
settings.engraving_guide_text: Engraving is a permanent imprint design crafted by hand or machine / laser onto the surface of your jewelry, making your piece even more special, unique and memorable. Adding a meaningful story behind your gift is the perfect way to celebrate all moments and creating a personal heirloom piece that can be passed down for generations.
settings.delivery_content:
SHIPPING

  • All of our pieces are custom made and will take up to 21 - business days for production.
  • Select styles are available in stock and ready to ship out within 1 to 3 business days. Contact us to inquire about our in-stock collection.
  • Purchases are delivered in an branded black box tied with a ribbon and a certificate of authenticity.
  • All domestic orders are insured and shipped out via FedEx Overnight. An adult signature is required for all deliveries.
  • All international orders are insured and shipped out with a trusted carrier within our network.
  • International purchaser may be subject to import taxes, custom duties and/or fees imposed by the destination country. These charges will be collected once your shipment arrives. We will not be responsible for any international shipping fees.
  • See our delivery FAQs for more details on shipping methods, costs and delivery times

    RETURN

  • Returns are acceptable only in the merchandise original condition.
  • You will be responsible for a 15% restocking fee and $40 return shipping fee.
  • Return credit is applicable towards the original payment method or a Jade Trau credit towards a future purchase.
  • We cannot take return on items that have been worn or altered.
  • We cannot take return on engagement rings, engraved styles, and any other custom order.
  • See our return FAQs for more details on our policy.

settings.title: About Me
settings.blog_aboutme_content:
Moleez is unique and modern looking Shopify Theme. It is the most Flexible Shopify Theme with powerful shop functionality.

All these amazing features are blended together in Moleez  your powerful, stylish and attractive responsive Shopify Theme.

Make your business with our theme. We are sure that it will satisfy all your needs!

settings.sub_title_about_texts_1:
A great About Us page helps builds trust between you and your customers. The more content you provide about you and your business, the more confident people will be when purchasing from your store.

Your About Us page might include:

  • Who you are
  • Why you sell the items you sell
  • Where you are located
  • How long you have been in business
  • How long you have been running your online shop
  • Who are the people on your team
  • Contact information
  • Social links (Twitter, Facebook)

To edit the content on this page, go to the Pages section of your Shopify admin.

settings.notification_cookies_text: This is a standard cookie notice which you can easily adapt or disable as you like in the admin. We use cookies to ensure that we give you the best experience on our website.

settings.subtitlefaq: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify ?
settings.contentfaq: 1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format) 2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded. 3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.

settings.subtitlefaq: What I have to do when I need your support?
settings.contentfaq: To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps: 1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members 2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get. 3/ Specify which template and version you are using. 4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue. 5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co

settings.subtitlefaq: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
settings.contentfaq: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed

settings.subtitlefaq: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
settings.contentfaq: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.

settings.subtitlefaq: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
settings.contentfaq: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.

settings.subtitlefaq: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
settings.contentfaq: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).

settings.subtitlefaq: I want to have the dropdown cart?
settings.contentfaq: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.

settings.subtitlefaq: What is included in the theme package?
settings.contentfaq: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.

settings.subtitlefaq: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait.
settings.contentfaq: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.

settings.subtitlefaq: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
settings.contentfaq: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you dont want to scale the image.

settings.subtitlefaq: Can I add borders around our product images?
settings.contentfaq: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.

settings.subtitlefaq: Can I have multi level menu?
settings.contentfaq: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.

settings.subtitlefaq: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
settings.contentfaq: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark Urgent in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.

settings.subtitlefaq: Does the theme support Variant Image?
settings.contentfaq: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://cleversoft-ciao.myshopify.com/collections/fashion/products/printed-floral-shirts

settings.title: LATE 1800S
settings.content:
Jades great-great grandfather started a cutting diamond trade in Antwerp, Belgium.

From polished to rough diamonds, the Trau directly source from the largest suppliers of diamonds, De Beers, and has been mastering the craftsmanship of cutting and polishing diamonds for the industry.

settings.title: EARLY 1900S
settings.content:
Jades great-great grandfather started a cutting diamond trade in Antwerp, Belgium.

From polished to rough diamonds, the Trau directly source from the largest suppliers of diamonds, De Beers, and has been mastering the craftsmanship of cutting and polishing diamonds for the industry.

Jades great-great grandfather started a cutting diamond trade in Antwerp, Belgium.

From polished to rough diamonds, the Trau directly source from the largest suppliers of diamonds, De Beers, and has been mastering the craftsmanship of cutting and polishing diamonds for the industry.

settings.title: HISTORY
settings.text: After a decade of dealing with stones, the diamond world was ready for a shake-up, jade has implemented 20 years of her experience in the  industry to design a covetable brand of ready-to-wear, refined diamond jewelry.
settings.content:
A New York City native, Jade Trau is the true embodiment of the designer's history in the diamond industry. Each piece in the collection is crafted around the diamond first before the design, creating a modern sentimental jewelry that will last for generations. Inspired by the synergy between her past and the present, drawing upon her family heritage as a fifth-generation diamantaire, Jade truly understand the anatomy of a diamond which is reflected throughout her collection.

Now, Jade's artistry is forging the path for diamond jewelry designs from her popularized custom restyling house to creating a new kind of classics, Jade is pushing the boundaries of the jewelry industry with a collection that is wearable and embraces an effortlessly cool style that you just want to add more to -- because no one ever stops after one Jade Trau piece. Get playful with it and add more to your story!
settings.heading: HOW OUR STORY BEGAN

settings.title: OUR MATERIALS
settings.content:
Gold
We exclusively use real, solid 18-karat gold in our collections. Jade Trau is conscious of the environmental impact of metal sourcing and makes a conscious effort to use recycled gold for the majority of our pieces.


DIAMONDS
All of our diamonds are carefully and ethically sourced to ensure that you receive the highest quality stone while feeling good about where it came from. We exclusively use 100% genuine, natural diamonds graded F/G in color and VS2 clarity; our philosophy is to honor the integrity and story of each diamond we work with and pay homage to the billions of years it takes for them to form under the earth's surface.

Learn more about our materials.

settings.title: DIAMOND EDUCATION
settings.content:
CUT
The Cut refers to the way in which each angle and facet of the diamond is cut and can vary vastly between diamonds.

CARAT
The Cut refers to the way in which each angle and facet of the diamond is cut and can vary vastly between diamonds.

CLARITY
The Cut refers to the way in which each angle and facet of the diamond is cut and can vary vastly between diamonds.

COLOUR
The Cut refers to the way in which each angle and facet of the diamond is cut and can vary vastly between diamonds.

Learn more about Diamonds.

settings.text: A NEW TYPE OF FINE JEWELRY MADE IN NEW YORK CITY AND HANDCRAFTED NATURAL DIAMOND, 18K GOLD & PLATINUM.

settings.pdp_title_about:
All of our jewelry is hand crafted in our New York City workshop and personally gift wrapped using our signature Jade Trau packaging.

Please allow up to 20 business days for your pieces to be completed. Select styles are available in stock for express delivery (2 - 3 business days for domestic orders). You can discover what we have in stock here.

Local pickup is available from any of our New York locations here.

International orders may be subject to import taxes, custom duties and/or fees imposed by the destination country, collected when the shipment arrives.

When your item(s) is ready to ship, our team will contact you via email or text to confirm the delivery window. An adult signature is required for all deliveries.

Visit our Shipping & Return Page to learn more

settings.greeting_message: Hi, message us with any questions. We're happy to help!
